item.title: [pi] firecape emote [pi[
item.dc:creator: @Gsempire Gsempire
item.description:
@Gsempire wrote:

I am trying to add my firecape emote from my old delta source on my new PI source. Can someone help me rename the delta code to PI code.

DELTA CODE

setAnimation(1110); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX); stillgfx(453, absY, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX-1); stillgfx(287, absY, absX); lowGFX(346, 0);

How do I make the GFX on PI in front or behind the player?

Read full topic
